thread.title: Gershon Koffie wants Whitecaps to end CONCACAF Champions League campaign with a win
thread.title_full: Gershon Koffie wants Whitecaps to end CONCACAF Champions League campaign with a win

title: Gershon Koffie wants Whitecaps to end CONCACAF Champions League campaign with a win
text:
18:10 CET Gershon Koffie wants Whitecaps to end CONCACAF Champions League campaign with a win - www.ghanasoccernet.com Gerhson Koffie 
Ghanaian midfielder Gershon Koffie wants his Vancouver Whitecaps side to end their inaugural CONCACAF Champions League campaign with a win against Honduran side C.D. Olimpia on Thursday. 
The match will not have any bearing on the standings with Seattle Sounders FC securing qualification from the Group. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
